title: mahAdEvEna pAlitOsmyaham
sahitya:
mahAdEvEna pAlitOsmyaham mahanIya sAmrAjya pradEna


anupallavi

 mahA kailAsa giri vihArENa mAnita guruguha sannuta padEna


caraNam   pancAkSara mantra svarUpENa pArvatI mannOllAsa karaNEna 
parashiva tatva bOdhita nipuNEna parama shAnta svarUpAtmakEna 
pancabhUta prapancAtmakEna vAnchita phalaprada catura tarENa 
panca mahA pApOpa shamanEna pankajAsanuta gangAdharENa
